cookingTips: Blend kiwis with sugar and lime juice until completely smooth for uniform popsicles
Strain mixture through fine mesh if you prefer seedless pops with smoother texture
Freeze for at least 6-8 hours, inserting sticks after 2-3 hours of initial freezing
enrichment.coachingPrompt: These refreshing frozen treats combine kiwi tartness with citrus brightness. Do you prefer a smoother texture or one with visible kiwi seeds?
